definition: dew/syrup/nectar/outdoors (not under cover)/to show/to reveal/to betray/to expose

sentences.english: An internal member leaked information, so I got to know the truth.
sentences.chinese: 內部人員的露風，我得知了事情的真相。

sentences.english: Miki Rofu is an outstanding poet among the contemporary neo- romanticists in Japan.
sentences.chinese: 三木露風是日本近代新浪漫主義文學獨具特色的詩人。
